original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2741)@ 在武將四周，召喚出12隻  <color=#4cc769>黃巾兵</color>，攻擊附近的敵人。  <color=#4cc769>黃巾刀兵</color>屬性： <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1381)@ <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color>$Soldier_Str(1381)@ <color=#4cc769> 黃巾槍兵</color>屬性：<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1386)@ <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color>$Soldier_Str(1386)@ <color=#4cc769>黃巾弓兵</color>屬性：<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1391)@<color=#FFE787>武力值：</color>$Soldier_Str(1391)@
